moduleMeta.name: riverParameter
moduleMeta.author: longyinping11@lzb.ac.cn
moduleMeta.description: reading river parameters including length, bed slope, width, depth and roughness of rivers

var.name: kfsFile
var.description: the file according to which the Pfafstetter coded river network will be generated

var.name: riverFilePath
var.description: the file path in which the river parameters are saved

var.name: upstreamID1
var.description: the left upper stream ID of each river

var.name: upstreamID2
var.description: the right upper stream ID of each river

var.name: row
var.description: the row number of each grid in each flow interval

var.name: col
var.description: the colum number of each grid in each flow interval

var.name: ngrid
var.description: the number of grids in each flow interval

var.name: nflow
var.description: the number of flow intervals in each subbasin
